casebody.data:
HEMBRY
v.
BECK. No. 175P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Theodis Beck.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of April 2006 by Plaintiff to Proceed in Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2006."
